textBox.name: Lyz
textBox.text: Murrr...

textBox.name: Lyz
textBox.text: Not again...

textBox.name: Lyz
textBox.text: A-       Ah..

textBox.name: Lyz
textBox.text: Hey there..

textBox.name: Lyz
textBox.text: Sorry for ruining the immersion..

textBox.name: Lyz
textBox.text: Don't worry..           I'll clean this mess up real quick..

textBox.name: Lyz
textBox.text: You can go back to..          reading..

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (It starts shoving the shards of the broken vase into its body,       along with the flowers)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (It continues rubbing its sleeve over the puddle until it vanishes)

next.question: (It continues rubbing its sleeve over the puddle until it vanishes)

textBox.name: Lyz
textBox.text: Just a slimy creature..

textBox.name: Lyz
textBox.text: Nobody of great importance...

textBox.name: Lyz
textBox.text: You’re in the library…          duh.

textBox.name: Lyz
textBox.text: Pay me no mind.          I was never here..

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (After collecting the last piece,       it pulls out what looks like a vase,        inluding flowers,         out of its body)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (It slowly places it onto the table,         giving it a smack after tilting over a few times before nodding proudly at it standing still)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (Within an instant it glares back at you before swiftly vanishing trough the door)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (You attempt to chase after it but before you manage to catch up,         it has already vanished tracelessly)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (A cold shiver sparks throughout you as you stare out into the dark corridor,         moving back out of instinct)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (You stare at the pot)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (You feel as if it is staring back at you,         remembering that you never actually saw the pot before it was destroyed..)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (As far as you are concerned,       this might as well be the worst replica in the history of ever)

next.question: (As far as you are concerned, this might as well be the worst replica in the history of ever)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (You proudly agree with your own assessment)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (The pot continues to silently stare you down)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (The pot? continues to silently stare you down)

textBox.name: (Yellow)
textBox.text: {italic}*skitter*{/italic}

textBox.name: (Yellow)
textBox.text: {italic}*thunk*{/italic}               Squeeeeeeee!!!

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (You just barely manage to move in time to see a glimpse of the creature,       holding its head as it squeezes trough a blue tear in the wall)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (Before you have any chance to react,      the tear closes up behind it)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (...What was that about?)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (Your vision wanders along the cells across the room as you notice some lights with hovering blocks in front of them, vaguely resembling books)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (They seem entranced by their task as you continue to gaze at the tall cells filled with blocks, taking up most of the space in the room)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (You move closer to the shelves,    trying to mimic the lights but without great success..)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (You back away,     not wanting to fall into a similar trance like the lights in the room.)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (If these truly are books..      What is written in them?)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (You look around and notice an uncountable amount of shimmers, floating around in the room)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (Some vanish and reappear at different locations as others remain still or float around)

one.text: Attempt to call out to them

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (You try to speak but nothing comes out.          The lights seem to ignore you anyway..)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (You look down,        noticing the absence of a physical body while hovering above the ground.        You seem to be like them)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (The Souls seem to wander around as they usually do.        It feels,        almost tranquil in a way)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (You stare at the book you woke up in front of. The title reads “Where Lilies never bloom”)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (You try to reach out to open it but the absence of hands makes this task harder than it seems)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (You try to use some sort of telepathic power like the other lights do...     without great success)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (Somehow you feel almost disappointed)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (Despite your greatest efforts you seem to be unable to just “continue reading”, already failing at simply opening up the thing)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (Was it even open in the first place?)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (The title reads: “Where Lilies never bloom”)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (You try to get back to where you were before, as you try to focus on the story)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (Yet for some reason you keep imagining a blue screen with a sad smiley..)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (The title reads: “Where Lilies never bloom”)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (You try to get back to where you were before, as you try to focus on the story)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (Your mind goes through all the things it experienced last time, as you start to fall back into a state of trance...)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (You stare at the door)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (Before even processing it, you seemed to have wandered over to it again as if it were pulling you in)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (You feel that shiver again as you glare at the endless seeming corridor outside)

next.question: (You feel that shiver again as you glare at the endless seeming corridor outside)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (You decide to stay here for now. Maybe there is something you missed...)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (As you stare at the door it seems to be staring back at you, beckoning you to enter through it again)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (You decide to not be tempted by it again..             For now)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (You move out into the endless hallway..)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (After wandering the halls of the library for what seemed like forever, you slowly start to get dizzy)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (The halls seem to converge into one another as if the library itself had no distinct shape or form)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (It feels like you have seen past corridors again and again as you continue on forward)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (You notice noises that sound like laughter, slowly fading into the scratching of metal as your vision starts to vibrate)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (Sudden smells and memories of past events rush to you as the corridor walls start merging and closing in as you phase through them)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (You feel a heavy impact,        followed by silence until your consciousness fades)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (You wake up, feeling..      surprisingly well as you notice you are in the room you were, before embarking on this journey)

textBox.name: (Architect)
textBox.text: Huh.             So you do notice me...

textBox.name: (Architect)
textBox.text: Please look at the red bot.

textBox.name: (Architect)
textBox.text: Alright..

textBox.name: (Architect)
textBox.text: You don’t have eyes..           No need to be overdramatic.

textBox.name: (Architect)
textBox.text: Please answer these questions:

textBox.name: (Architect)
textBox.text: What’s your Identifier or Name?

textBox.name: (Architect)
textBox.text: We will get to that..

textBox.name: (Architect)
textBox.text: Please answer these questions:

textBox.name: (Architect)
textBox.text: What’s your Identifier or Name?

textBox.name: (Architect)
textBox.text: What were you feeling and or thinking about, when leaving the room?

next.question: (What were you feeling and or thinking about, when leaving the room?)

textBox.name: (Architect)
textBox.text: I see.. Mhm..

textBox.name: (Architect)
textBox.text: What were you experiencing before “waking up”?

textBox.name: (Architect)
textBox.text: Alright..   Final question:

textBox.name: (Architect)
textBox.text: What was the first thing you noticed after “waking up”?

next.question: What was the first thing you noticed after “waking up”?

textBox.name: (Architect)
textBox.text: Oook...

textBox.name: (Architect)
textBox.text: What a pain...

textBox.name: (Architect)
textBox.text: So..      usually souls like you don't just..     Go outside of rooms.

textBox.name: (Architect)
textBox.text: So please refrain from that in the future.

textBox.name: (Architect)
textBox.text: Since you seem unable to just “Go” to other rooms like the rest, use this instead..

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (They hand you a device but before you are able to process what it is, it turns into blue particles, flowing into you)

one.text: What do you mean like the rest?

textBox.name: (Architect)
textBox.text: That is what I'm trying to figure out..

textBox.name: (Architect)
textBox.text: There seems to be some bug that causes some souls to become conscious instead of just existing in a passive state..

textBox.name: (Architect)
textBox.text: Just some odd things happening around the place..

textBox.name: (Architect)
textBox.text: I mostly figured it out but the origin of the cause has yet to be traced..

textBox.name: (Architect)
textBox.text: Righty.. I should start from the beginning.

textBox.name: (Architect)
textBox.text: Welcome to the Library beyond time..

textBox.name: (Architect)
textBox.text: An infinite space of stored knowledge and memories from past to present and so on.

textBox.name: (Architect)
textBox.text: Souls visit this place mostly accidentally through either deep meditation or slumber, experiencing various bits of data stored in these halls.

textBox.name: (Architect)
textBox.text: If you had a fever dream once you probably visited section CRSD.

textBox.name: (Architect)
textBox.text: After returning to consciousness, said souls leave this place again since an aware one cannot upkeep a connection to the Library.

textBox.name: (Architect)
textBox.text: At least that is how it is supposed to work.               Yet here you are..

textBox.name: (Architect)
textBox.text: Clearly observing me...

textBox.name: (Architect)
textBox.text: Violently...

textBox.name: (Architect)
textBox.text: Ugh, I don't like this anymore..

textBox.name: (Architect)
textBox.text: J-just use that device I gave you and don't enter the corridors again.

textBox.name: (Architect)
textBox.text: You are interrupting my work and I don't wanna keep dragging you back into the rooms..

textBox.name: (Architect)
textBox.text: The thing has the ID of this room and the Nexus Core already entered...

textBox.name: (Architect)
textBox.text: Just ask them about things in the future and not me.

next.question: (Just ask them about things in the future and not me)

textBox.name: (Architect)
textBox.text: Y-yeah.. No problem...

textBox.name: (Architect)
textBox.text: Bye.

textBox.name: (Architect)
textBox.text: ]=[; Return

textBox.name: (Architect)
textBox.text: You will figure it out. Bye.

textBox.name: (Architect)
textBox.text: ]=[; Return

two.text: Why are you staring at me like that..?

textBox.name: Lyz
textBox.text: AAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!

textBox.name: Lyz
textBox.text: Cause you’re interesting.

textBox.name: Lyz
textBox.text: Well..      at least partly.

one.text: What is that supposed to mean?

textBox.name: Lyz
textBox.text: Another?

textBox.name: Lyz
textBox.text: Oh..

textBox.name: Lyz
textBox.text: It means that you’re at least +1 interesting.

textBox.name: Lyz
textBox.text: Glad you are.

textBox.name: Lyz
textBox.text: {bold}AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!{/bold}

textBox.name: Lyz
textBox.text: Why are we having a screaming contestttt?

next.question: (Why are we having a screaming contestttt?)

textBox.name: Lyz
textBox.text: I didn’t do anything though..

textBox.name: Lyz
textBox.text: Valid.

textBox.name: Lyz
textBox.text: ..Weirdo.

textBox.name: Lyz
textBox.text: Well, anyway..

textBox.name: Lyz
textBox.text: Where u at?

textBox.name: Lyz
textBox.text: Password restricted?

textBox.name: Lyz
textBox.text: Uhm..     oh, the audiolog.

textBox.name: Lyz
textBox.text: I heard it was being treated as a separate entity of the chronological story..

textBox.name: Lyz
textBox.text: And thus needed to be simulated.

textBox.name: Lyz
textBox.text: So all you gotta do is figure out the password the owner of the audio log would have used.

next.question: (So all you gotta do is figure out the password the owner of the audio log would have used)

two.text: I might know who that is.

textBox.name: Lyz
textBox.text: Isn’t that obvious?

two.text: Is it? I’ll figure it out myself then.

textBox.name: Lyz
textBox.text: Oh..     It’s Nora’s.

textBox.name: Lyz
textBox.text: A curious one.        I like that.

textBox.name: Lyz
textBox.text: Oya.     U a smarty ain’t ya.        Noice.

textBox.name: Lyz
textBox.text: In any case, I won’t tell you the password though.

textBox.name: Lyzzy
textBox.text: What I will tell you, is this though:

textBox.name: Lyzzy
textBox.text: Ha11-7L

textBox.name: Lyzzy
textBox.text: Just because I like ya~

textBox.name: Lyz
textBox.text: Uhm, anyway..    Imma go now.

textBox.name: Lyz
textBox.text: Byeeeeeeeeeee

textBox.name: Lyz
textBox.text: Oh right..

textBox.name: Lyzzy
textBox.text: The names Vyr’nix Lyz. Or “V&*-)=@zz” Or “The shapeless” Or-

textBox.name: Lyzzy
textBox.text: Actually.        Just call me Lyz or Lyzzy…

textBox.name: Lyzzy
textBox.text: Until we meet againnnnnnnnnnn~
{italic}*bzzzzzzz*{/italic}

textBox.name: Lyzzy
textBox.text: Hey, hey, wait, hol up.

textBox.name: Lyzzy
textBox.text: You can’t just first try this thing while I'm here waiting..

textBox.name: Lyzzy
textBox.text: I was gonna have an entire spiel about observing you while acting coy,

textBox.name: Lyzzy
textBox.text: And hinting you in the correct direction of the password!

next.question: (And hinting you in the correct direction of the password!)

textBox.name: Lyz
textBox.text: Well it’s too late for thaaat…

textBox.name: Lyzzy
textBox.text: {italic}B r u h{/italic}.

textBox.name: Lyz
textBox.text: My entire conversation plan is redundant now…

textBox.name: Lyz
textBox.text: Well it’s doomed anyway…

textBox.name: Lyz
textBox.text: Guess as a reward I can let you in on a little secret:

textBox.name: Lyz
textBox.text: Ha11-7L

textBox.name: Lyz
textBox.text: I’m sure an apparent smarty like you will figure out what to do with that..

textBox.name: Lyz
textBox.text: Anyway..       I’ll go re-calculate my expectations for you souls..

textBox.name: Lyz
textBox.text: byeeeeeeeee….
